nodes.label: Illustrate plants with and without water.
Potted plant with a few green leaves and upright stems.
Potted plant with droopy stems and dull green leaves.
Understands that water contributes to plants having green leaves and upright stems.
Understands that lack of water leads to wilting and dull leaves.
Did not illustrate complete signs of healthy growth such as flowers or fully vibrant leaves.
Feedback: Consider adding more signs of healthy growth, like flowers or vibrant leaves, to the drawing with water.
Did not illustrate brown spots or specific dehydration signs.
Feedback: Include signs of dehydration, such as brown spots, to show more detailed understanding of plant health without water.
